Normalization¶

BlockCanvas oriented¶

temp_norm Computes the running-absolute-mean normalization of 1D numpy array x
stream_temp_norm Computes the running-absolute-mean normaliz.
stream_1bit_norm Compute the 1-bit normalization of all Traces in the Stream object
spect_norm Computes the spectral normalization of 1D numpy array x
stream_spect_norm Computes the spectral normalization of all Traces in st
